Module com.benedict.minibank
Package com.benedict.library.dao

Class AuthorDAO

java.lang.Object
com.benedict.library.dao.AuthorDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericDAO
public class AuthorDAO extends Object implements GenericDAO
DAO class for managing Author data. Implements the GenericDAO interface to provide basic CRUD operations for Authors.
